recommendations: Wayne Tan ‚ÄúSarthak and I worked together during my time in Livspace, most notably on the website and demand funnel launch for Malaysia and Singapore. Possessing deep technical expertise and an unmatched product and business acumen, his vast experience is only matched by his great personality, and problem solving mindset - which has led to the timely and seamless launch of various platform experiences which greatly influenced the success of Livspace's demand generation. I highly recommend Sarthak for his deep product expertise and ability to align, lead, and deliver, stakeholders and projects, and earnestly believe he will be a valued addition as both a product manager and great all-around teammate and friend.‚Äù

Catherine Watts ‚ÄúSarthak was a go-to team member for us, able to meet the quality bar and necessary timelines for every one of his research deliverables. I was immensely grateful to have him on our team, as Sarthak is a consistent high-performer and able to embrace more complex projects with confidence (especially those that didn't have a clear path forward at the start.) He is great at diagnosing the right problem and has a persistent focus on finding answers/creating actionable guidance most meaningful for clients. ‚Äù
